amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to provide $8 million for the Veterans Transportation Program to assist veterans in attending to all their medical appointments in a timely manner.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Carbajal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
